title: AMEOKAMA (DREAMWELL, Etc.) Streams Dreamy, Blackened New Single
description: A mix of dreamy shoegaze and blackened tendencies.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: A mix of dreamy shoegaze and blackened tendencies.
text: ameokama is the new solo project of Aki McCullough (Dreamwell, A Constant Knowledge Of Death). The project is now streaming the new single "i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening", and it's the perfect mix of beautifully shoegazey and inwardly blackened. "i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening" comes alongside a video by Will Hall and features Sylvia Haynes on upright bass, Avery Sylvaine (Mud Whale, Oak & Ivy) on drums, and a mix and master by McCullough at Nu House Studios. ameokama will release its debut album i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening on February 7, 2025. Pre-orders are available here alongside a shirt designed by Arif Suhaimi of Rotworks and Wormrot. Want More Metal? html:
ameokama is the new solo project of Aki McCullough (Dreamwell, A Constant Knowledge Of Death). The project is now streaming the new single "i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening", and it's the perfect mix of beautifully shoegazey and inwardly blackened.

"i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening" comes alongside a video by Will Hall and features Sylvia Haynes on upright bass, Avery Sylvaine (Mud Whale, Oak & Ivy) on drums, and a mix and master by McCullough at Nu House Studios. ameokama will release its debut album i will be clouds in the morning and rain in the evening on February 7, 2025. Pre-orders are available here alongside a shirt designed by Arif Suhaimi of Rotworks and Wormrot.
